sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Movie } from 'types/movie' import { BASE_URL } from 'utils/requests' import './styles.css' type Props = { movieId: string } export const FormCard = ({ movieId }: Props) => { const [movie, setMovie] = useState() useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/movies/${movieId}`).then((response) => { setMovie(response.data) }) }, [movieId]) return (

{movie?.title}

) }
